new_settings: takes a specific medication, e.g., antipsychotics

current_setting: frequently repeats the same information and needs to be reminded why he is at the doctor's office
new_settings: does not repeat information and remembers the purpose of the visit

current_setting: claims to be a famous poet and recently had a poem published in a national magazine
new_settings: does not make any unusual claims
presence of focal deficits, e.g., weakness in one limb

current_setting: no long-term memory deficits and able to count in serial sevens without error
new_settings: long-term memory deficits and unable to count in serial sevens

current_setting: atrophy of the anterior thalami and small mamillary bodies
